Package client

Interface Proxy

All Superinterfaces:
climatemonitoring.core.Database
All Known Implementing Classes:
ProxyImpl
public interface Proxy extends climatemonitoring.core.Database
The proxy interface is able to create the connection, closure and communication from the client to the server
Version:
1.0-SNAPSHOT
Author:
francescolops

  • Method Details

    • connect

      boolean connect(String address, short port) throws climatemonitoring.core.ConnectionLostException
      Allows the connection to the desired address.
      Parameters:
      address - the address the user wants to connect to
      port - the port the user wants to connect to
      Returns:
      True if the connection was succesfull, false if not
      Throws:
      climatemonitoring.core.ConnectionLostException - If the client loses connection during the operation

    • ping

      long ping() throws climatemonitoring.core.ConnectionLostException
      Sends a ping request.
      Returns:
      The time (in milliseconds) elapsed between sending the ping packet and receiving it from the server
      Throws:
      climatemonitoring.core.ConnectionLostException - If the client loses connection during the operation

    • close

      void close() throws climatemonitoring.core.ConnectionLostException
      Closes the connection between the socket and the server
      Throws:
      climatemonitoring.core.ConnectionLostException

    • forceClose

      void forceClose() throws climatemonitoring.core.ConnectionLostException
      Forces the disconnection between the socket and the server
      Throws:
      climatemonitoring.core.ConnectionLostException - If the client loses connection during the operation
